h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: When you reach an open cell gate ahead with a small lantern posted above it, that's an indication that you've reached a stairway in the interior section that leads to the next level up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
When you reach an open cell gate ahead with a small lantern posted above it, that's an indication that you've reached a stairway in the interior section that leads to the next level up.
